fields.name: Passives:
fields.value: - Suitor: You gain the Suitor’s Quarters buff. [Activates D2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Passages: Visit another room on top of your regular room that isn’t listed in available rooms for the Night phase. Cannot be role specific rooms or voting rooms. [2 uses, 2 CD, Unique, Unlocks D2]
- Vaults: Gain a special card of your choice. [1 use, Unique, Unlocks D3]
- Rummage: Gain a random card immediately. [Infinite, 2 CD]
